name: Summer Programs
description: Offering six weeks of camp filled with joy, exploration, surprises, fun, and discovery for rising Preschool 4 to rising 8th grade. - Lunch and snacks are included in all full day camps (for half day camps, snacks are provided). - Weekly field trips and are included, and early care (8 - 8:45 am) and after care (3 - 6:00 pm) are available at an additional cost.

howToGetIt: Use Online Registration TOOL for participation.
cost: This is a fee based service
